text:
Arjun Kapoor to walk the ramp at LFW

The lead male actor of Ki & Ka , Arjun Kapoor, will be the celebrity showstopper at the upcoming Lakme Fashion Week for Manish Malhotra’s spring summer collection.

Titled “Elements”, the collection by Malhotra will open the five-day fashion extravaganza. The celebrity designer took to Twitter to make the announcement a day before the show. “#dapper @arjunk26 to walk for my #Spring #summer #collection #ELEMENTS’ @LakmeFashionWk #openingshow.” Lakme Fashion Week will begin from March 29 and conclude on April 3. — PTI
title: ENT-MANISH
